title: Symbolism in Shrek | When the marginal wins
description:
Comparing the symbolism of center and periphery between the movie "Shrek" and the Greek play "The Bacchae"  by Euripides.  I then show how it relates to the changes happening in our world.

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings

transcript_parts.text: in my last video I discussed the

but before we get there we need to

baki by Euripides just seem like the
